feed.title: Your awesome title
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: Macbook Unlock
entry.content:
Seven Star Password Removal Service

MODELS: Apple Macbook, Macbook Pro, Macbook Air, Mac mini

We offer password bypass for both user-set and UFI Apple Password locks that will permanently wipe the EFI firmware and ICloud System Pin Code Lock and restore to it's default state. Through such measures, the Mac will disappear from the owner ICloud user account forever. You will not have to worry about being tracked by the original order through apps such as Find My IPhone.

We offer a life-time warranty that guaranteeds your product will never come back locked.

NOTE: For Macbook Pro Models 2010 - 2011, we will have to take out the motherboard in order to unlock it. Thus,it would be recommended if you can take it out in advance to save time during servicing.

PRICE: $100
entry.summary: Seven Star Password Removal Service MODELS: Apple Macbook, Macbook Pro, Macbook Air, Mac mini

entry.title: Magsafe Services
entry.content:
Magsafe Macbook Power Adaptor Repair

MODELS: Magsafe 1 and 2

We offer repair services to Authentic Magsafe Power Adaptor Chargers with a Seven Day Warranty

These services will replace the old cable with a authentic Apple cable that is certified to not be a fire hazard.

PRICE: $20

Magsafe Macbook Power Adaptor Cable

MODELS: Magsafe 2

We offer Magsafe Charger Cables if you are looking to fix the adaptor yourself. We can show you how to repair it self, however you will need to get the tools. However, it is highly recommended that you already know what you are doing if you are going to repair the charger adaptor yourself.


PRICE: $15
entry.summary: Magsafe Macbook Power Adaptor Repair MODELS: Magsafe 1 and 2 We offer repair services to Authentic Magsafe Power Adaptor Chargers with a Seven Day Warranty These services will replace the old cable with a authentic Apple cable that is certified to not be a fire hazard. PRICE: $20

entry.title: Virus Removal
entry.content:
Virus/Malware Removal Services

MODELS: PC, Mac

In this day and age, viruses and malware are more prevalant than ever. We offer virus and malware removal services at a competive rate. Bring your computer in for a free estimate. No hidden fees. Please note that there are such malwares that are impossible to remove without a hard reset.

We offer a life-time warranty that guaranteeds your product will be as good as new after undergoing our service

NOTE: Our repair services can range to the highest of $50 or lower depending on how complicated the repair is


PRICE: $50 or less
entry.summary: Virus/Malware Removal Services MODELS: PC, Mac In this day and age, viruses and malware are more prevalant than ever. We offer virus and malware removal services at a competive rate. Bring your computer in for a free estimate. No hidden fees. Please note that there are such malwares that are impossible to remove without a hard reset.

entry.title: Computer Repair
entry.content:
PC and Mac Computer Repair

MODELS: Any PC or Mac

We offer services that can fix PC or Mac problems that are stopping you from using it at a massively competitive price. Please come to the store for an estimate to deem if your computer is capable of being repaired. Please note that we are the most competitive store in Calgary that offers computer repair at a max of $50 or even less.

We offer a life-time warranty that guaranteeds your product will be back in perfect condiiton.

NOTE: Sometimes, computers are beyond physical repair and will need a replacement. Come to the store for a free estimate.


PRICE: $50 or less
entry.summary: PC and Mac Computer Repair MODELS: Any PC or Mac

entry.title: CONTACT
entry.content:
Youâ€™ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyllâ€™s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.

You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
